efficiency.subtitle: Saved Per Month
efficiency.title: Research Time
efficiency.description: Replaced manual history digging with AI-powered instant search retrieval.
efficiency.longDescription: Before Curify, the average clinician at Partner Clinic A spent ~15 hours a month manually cross-referencing patient history, lab results, and paper archives. By implementing our Semantic AI Search, we indexed 50,000+ documents.
keyResults: Instant keyword retrieval across 10 years of records.
Zero time spent locating physical files.

safety.subtitle: Error Reduction
safety.title: Patient Safety
safety.description: IoT cabinets and AI cross-checks eliminated critical medication errors.
safety.longDescription: Medication errors are the leading cause of preventable harm. We deployed IoT-connected cabinets that only unlock for the specific nurse, patient, and dosage time. Coupled with AI contraindication checks, safety skyrocketed.
keyResults: Digital audit trail for every milligram dispensed.

operations.subtitle: Traceability
operations.title: Inventory Tracking
operations.description: End-to-end digital tracking from warehouse to patient administration.
operations.longDescription: Stockouts and expiration waste cost clinics thousands. Curify introduced a 'Pixel-to-Pill' tracking system. We now track inventory levels in real-time, automatically reordering supplies before they run out.
keyResults: Expiration date alerts 30 days in advance.

growth.subtitle: Faster Intake
growth.title: Patient Throughput
growth.description: Automated admissions allow clinics to scale without adding admin staff.
growth.longDescription: Scaling usually means hiring more admin staff. Curify changed the equation by automating the intake process. Patients fill forms digitally before arrival, and AI pre-populates the clinical chart.
keyResults: Admin staff refocused on patient experience.
Capacity increased without new real estate.
